channel.title: Is anyone using Petovera services
channel.description:
Hi, I'm thinking about trying the [Petovera](http://www.petovera.com) service to help with building the sales funnel and optimize it. Has anyone experience with them? Are they bringing results?
Thanks.

item.title: Is anyone using Petovera services
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
I think for a one- or two-person company, such a service become an expensive drain on your budget, and may result in no improvement to sales.

Read full topic
